casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee
v.
LaQuisha R. WORTHY et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017 LaQuisha R. Worthy, self-represented, and Anthony Pugh, self-represented, in support of the petition. Jordan W. Schur, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn. App. 904 , 149 A.3d 503 (2016), is denied.
